paper_abstract: A new high order Arakawa-like method for the incompressible vorticity equation in two-dimensions has been developed. Mimetic properties such as skew-symmetry, energy and enstrophy conservations for the semi-discretization are proved for periodic problems using arbitrary high order summation-by-parts operators. Numerical simulations corroborate the theoretical findings. (C) 2015 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A new high order energy and enstrophy conserving Arakawa-like Jacobian differential operator
